name: BSE1: Quest 4 Triumph
description:
Originally published Dec 2011... Now you can experience all the limited thrills and chills of the original BSE interactive experience with a slightly more convenient download.

Is the game official? Yup! Is it still lore-friendly? Probably not! Can entertainment be extracted from it's crisp, yet juicy files? We sure hope so!

So how about trying the fancy new old BSE game which the one-and-only Baconalen has carefully cooked up? Consider it his Christmas present to you! That’s right, now you, too, can participate in all the epic wonders of The Quest For Triumph! Maybe you will even be triumphant. Who knows? It’s best if you try and find out!

Minimum Requirements

  • A Windows computer that can display graphics. On a screen that is at least a few pixels in dimension.
  • A handful of megabytes of extra room on your hard drive.
  • Your Handy-dandy Questing Kit (surely you have one…)
